## FieldCheckbox.doValueUpdate\_() method

Update the value of the field, and update the checkElement.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doValueUpdate_(newValue: AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newValue | AnyDuringMigration | The value to be saved. The default validator guarantees that this is a either 'TRUE' or 'FALSE'. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
